name: End of Daylight
description:
Marisa is brewing a potion, which needs to be finished before the day ends.

Unfortunately, crucial ingredients are still missing and the sun has already started to set, leaving her with only a couple of minutes to rush and collect the missing ingredients. However, Marisa will miss no opportunity to gather as many valuable treasures as she can carry on the way.

Collect all 3 items before the music ends (about 4 min.) and bring them to the cauldron next to Marisa's house. Collect additional items for more points. Only up to 7 items can be held, so drop the ones you don't need anymore. Mushrooms in your inventory affect your shot strength and type. The game is slightly randomized each time, so it will take multiple playthroughs to see everything.

Controls:
- Arrow keys: move
- v: shoot
- c: drop item
- x: select next item

The game should be playable with a USB controller using the D-Pad and right-hand buttons.

notes:
This game is a fan work based on Touhou project. All elements of Touhou Project, including characters, music, setting, and concept, are property of ZUN/Team Shanghai Alice.

known bugs/features:
- items can technically be placed inside walls, so be careful where you drop them
- the score value displayed on the game over screen is incorrect, feel free to ignore it :)
